docs.text: rstats clone functions rrep A clone of rstats rep Parameters: x ( [type] ) – [description] times ( int ) – [description]. Defaults to 1. each ( int ) – [description]. Defaults to 1. length_out ( [type] ) – [description]. Defaults to None. Returns: [type] – [description] Examples: utils.rrep([1,2,3], 2, 1) table functions plotly_table [summary] Parameters: df ( [type] ) – [description] pdf_path ( [type] ) – [description]. Defaults to None. Returns: [type] – [description] Examples: import pandas as pd # hgt = 400 # wth = hgt * 1.55 df = pd.DataFrame(zip(["0.01544"], ["d"]), columns = ["b", "c"]) pyjsta.plotly_table(df, col_format = [".2f", ""]) md_table Create a markdown/pdf table from a Pandas DataFrame Parameters: df ( [type] ) – [description] pdf_path ( [type] ) – [description] Examples: import pandas as pd df = pd.DataFrame(zip(["a"], ["d"]), columns = ["b", "c"]) md_table(df, "test.pdf")
